name: MEMORIES OF TERROR(Beta)
description:
MEMORIES OF TERROR(Beta)

Escape from fear. A changing stage map. Retrieve your memories and escape.

Version 0.9.5
Level limit 10
5 available memories
Fixed minor bugs

This game is in beta.

There may be a defect.
In that case, please report the following URL and the phenomenon that occurred on the terminal.
In addition, future game content may change significantly.
Please note.

This game displays ads.

Contact komorebi.ap@gmail.com
